attributes.action: change current Drink-Driving Laws: If you drink it should be illegal to drive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is currently an offense to drive with more than 35 micrograms of alcohol in 100 millilitres of breath. We propose that this system is scrapped: simply, if you drink, you should not be allowed to get behind the wheel. We also propose that penalties for drink-driving be increased appropriately, to act as a proper deterrent and more importantly, to save the lives of innocent people.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
